column.name: TRANCODE
column.comment: Indicator for a record type for delta tables, N => New, M => Modify, D => Delete

column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers

column.name: FU_BAN
column.comment: Indication of the customer's billing account number. The customer is the (natural or legal) person to whom services are provided on the basis of a contract concluded with D2-Vodafone. For himself or others to him

column.name: FU_ID
column.comment: Identification  number of the follow-up

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: FU_TYPE
column.comment: Identification of the follow-up type.

column.name: FU_DUE_DATE
column.comment: field contains the date on which the follow-up is to be handled.

column.name: FU_STATUS
column.comment: contains the follow-up status. It can be O - Opened or O - C - Closed.

column.name: FU_ASSIGNED_TO
column.comment: This field contains the work position to which the follow-up is assigned.

column.name: FU_SUBSCRIBER
column.comment: Participant number

column.name: FU_TEXT
column.comment: contains the follow-up text. (free format)

column.name: FU_OPENED_BY
column.comment: This field contains the identification of the user that opened the follow-up - if applicable. Null - If the follow-up is opened by the system, or a valid user ID.

column.name: FU_OPEN_DATE
column.comment: This field contains the date on which the follow-up is opened.

column.name: FU_LOCKED_BY
column.comment: This field contains the identification of the user who locked the follow-up - if applicable. The value is null - if the follow-up is not locked.

column.name: FU_LOCKED_DATE
column.comment: This field contains the date and time at which the follow-up was locked - if applicable. Null - If the follow-up has not been locked, or a valid date.

column.name: FU_CLOSED_BY
column.comment: contains the identification of the user who closed the follow-up - if applicable. Null - if the follow-up is not closed, or if it is closed by the system, or a valid rep ID.

column.name: FU_CLOSE_DATE
column.comment: contains the date on which the follow-up is closed - if applicable. Null - If the follow-up has not been closed, or a valid date.

column.name: FU_CLOSE_REASON_CODE
column.comment: contains the reason the follow-up is closed.  Null if the follow-up is not closed or one of the following values: WK - Worked TR - Trans-ferred SY - Closed By System DP - Dept Is Paid

column.name: FU_BYPASS_REASON
column.comment: contains the reason the follow-up has been skipped, even though it should have been handled. Null if the follow-up has not been skipped or one of the following values: B - Line is busy or no answer

column.name: FU_BYPASS_TEXT
column.comment: contains free text that describes the reason for the bypass.

column.name: FU_BYPASS_DATE
column.comment: contains free text that describes the reason for the bypass.

column.name: FU_SOURCE
column.comment: Identifies the process which created the charge. Valid values: "B" - billing, "C" - CSM, "P" - POS, "N" - conversion, "F" - billing confirmation, "M" - EMI adjustment extract, "L" - collection.

column.name: FU_AMT
column.comment: This amount was credited / debited to the customer account using the AKG booking.

column.name: EU_FU_AMT
column.comment: The balance of the account, in Euro, at the time the entry was created.

column.name: FU_CURRENCY
column.comment: currency

column.name: CONV_RUN_NO
column.comment: Used for conversion.

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: \n
